author: Zhiyuan Chen and Johannes Gehrke and Flip Korn
title: Query Optimization In Compressed Database Systems
window: are not compressed. TPC-H data contains 8 tables and 61 attributes, 23 of which are string-valued. The string attributes account for about 60% of the total database size. We also used a 4MB of dataset with US census data, the adult data set [5] for experiments on compression strategies. The adult dataset contains a single table with 14 attributes, 8 of them string-valued, accounting for about 80%
